name: typora_plugin
author: David Behar Lombrozo
description: An Obsidian plugin that inserts two spaces on Enter and one space on Shift+Enter.

scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix style-enters && npm run build --prefix enter-mapping
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build:all && npm run move:all && rm -rf ~/Library/Mobile\ Documents/iCloud\~md\~obsidian/Documents/Personal/.obsidian/plugins/* && cp -r dist/* ~/Library/Mobile\ Documents/iCloud\~md\~obsidian/Documents/Personal/.obsidian/plugins/
